messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, Actually living and working in the York Outer constituency is so important, as I understand how Government decisions affect us locally. If I become your MP I will aim to restore honour, justice and common sense to Westminster, making sure tax payers’ money is spent wisely. I will be campaigning for better conditions for the elderly, vulnerable, students, business and ALL FAMILIES IN YORK. My business experience will bring professionalism to major issues such as the Local Plan and the NHS.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: By stopping our EU membership fee
issues.governance: restore honour, justice and common sense to Westminster

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Voter, Actually living and working in the York Outer constituency is so important, as I understand how Government decisions affect us locally.

contactInformation.address: Paul Abbott, 27 Spring Bank Avenue, Dunnington, York YO19 5PZ.

images.caption: Election Communication for UK Independence Party with Paul Abbott standing up for real change.
